title: The Great Cleanout
story: He had to clean out his apartment. There was so much to clean out. He had hundreds of books. What was he going to do with them? He couldn't keep all of them. He was moving to a smaller apartment. There was no room for all his books in his new apartment. There was no room for his bicycle. What was he going to do with his bicycle? He had a big TV. The TV was too big for his new apartment. What was he going to do with his big TV? He called up his brother. "Do you want my books, my bike, and my TV?" he asked. His brother said, "You should have a yard sale."
summary: A man is faced with the challenge of downsizing his possessions when moving to a smaller apartment and seeks advice from his brother.
image: An image of a cluttered apartment with books stacked on shelves, a bicycle leaning against a wall, and a large TV taking up space.
